name: Pop The Bubbles (felicitous)
description:
Pop The Bubbles

Made with Godot.

How To Play:

Click on the bubbles to pop them. 1 clicked bubble = 1 point. If a bubble is not clicked before it reaches its maximum size, then you lose a life. Once you've lost all of your lives, it is Game Over.

Development Status:

This game is currently in beta testing.

Overall difficulty is likely to be rebalanced depending on player feedback.

Known Issues/TODO List:

  • High score does not persist between sessions.
  • Not configured to run on fullscreen/mobile.

Release Log:

2021-09-15 (v1.0): Initial release.
